unnormalised: Lt. Gen. Bakshi (retd.) threw a *massive* Diwali party, and sources say it was more strategic than any war game he ever planned! Apparently, getting Col. Sharma and Brig. Desai to agree on the menu was tougher than negotiating a border dispute.
normalised: Lieutenant General Bakshi (retired) threw a massive Diwali party, and sources say it was more strategic than any war game he ever planned! Apparently, getting Colonel Sharma and Brigadier Desai to agree on the menu was tougher than negotiating a border dispute.

unnormalised: Word is, Adm. Rao nearly sank the buffet table trying to get to the gulab jamuns first. Meanwhile, Maj. Verma’s dance moves were declared a national security risk, causing even Cdr. Iyer to crack a smile.
normalised: Word is, Admiral Rao nearly sank the buffet table trying to get to the gulab jamuns first. Meanwhile, Major Verma’s dance moves were declared a national security risk, causing even Commander Iyer to crack a smile.

unnormalised: But the highlight? Capt. Khan allegedly tried to salute the DJ, mistaking him for his commanding officer. Guess some habits die harder than enemy combatants!
normalised: But the highlight? Captain Khan allegedly tried to salute the D-J, mistaking him for his commanding officer. Guess some habits die harder than enemy combatants!
